attributes.comment:
I am writing today to voice my opposition to the proposed rate increases in Document USCIS
2006-0044-0001. These rate incrases are beyond any fair and justifiable rate; they are exorbitant
and entirely unfair, given that many people coming here seeking citizenship often hold lower-wage
jobs and positions and are often trying to send as much money back home to their countries of
origin as possible to support their families. The unjustice propsed in this docket will not do anything
to fix any of the problems currently facing our countrys' immigration services, but instead represent
the current anti-immigrant climate so prevelant in our nation today. I am asking all elected officials
to vote against this impractical and unfair measure. Thank you for your time.
Sincerly,
Matt Fleurant
304 Granite Street
Biddeford, ME 04005
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Matt C. Fleurant
